list: Frame accented with metal corners and nail head embellishments
Can be hung horizontally or vertically
No assembly required; ready to hang

reviews.title: "Love love love!"
reviews.text: My husband and I are in the middle of a total farmhouse themed bathroom remodel. I was having a hard time finding a mirror that was neutral yet made a statement. I found this mirror at Lowes but wasn't sure if I wanted to spend that kind of money. We looked into what it would cost to frame our own mirror with a similar style and the prices panned out to be pretty equivalent. Luckily Lowes ran a 20% sale and I was able to snatch it up. The mirror is very sturdy REAL wood, which is a relief. It has mounting brackets both vertically and horizontally so you can hang the mirror to your preference. It's not super heavy either - my husband was able to hang it up himself. Overall, we are very pleased with this mirror and how it completes our bathroom.
reviews.author: Happylilmomma

reviews.title: "Love this mirror!"
reviews.text: This mirror looks great!
reviews.author: Heather

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: I wanted this mirror the minute I saw it. It's beautiful with a lot of style. Fits my decor perfectly
reviews.author: me

reviews.title: "Mirror"
reviews.text: Love this!  Nice quality & very pretty.  Looks nice with my cabinets & marble countertops.
reviews.author: Carol

reviews.title: "Looks custom in all my bathrooms!!!!"
reviews.text: Classic design for any room. Looks great mixed with different materials. Easy to hang, looks expensive!!!!We finished our remodel using these mirrors above our vanities!!
reviews.author: Showroom

reviews.title: "Great looking rustic mirror!!"
reviews.text: Pictures do not do this mirror justice!! Must see!! Extremely happy with this purchase and look forward to displaying this mirror for years to come. This is the 5th mirror I've purchased by Allen + Roth and have been satisfied with them all. Price and quality are right!!
reviews.author: njustis4all

reviews.title: "See Yourself Owning This Mirror"
reviews.text: Looks exactly as advertised online. Relatively easy to hang solo but would be better with a friend. If only I could have gotten that guy in the mirror to hold up the other side...
reviews.author: Hank

reviews.title: "great mirror"
reviews.text: I love the rustic look of this mirror. The metal details on each corner are great!
reviews.author: smk8298

reviews.title: "Great Quality!!"
reviews.text: Mirror looks great in my bathroom gives it a rustic farmhouse look!
reviews.author: Char

reviews.title: "Good Mirror"
reviews.text: Look we wanted at fair price. Easy to hang and goes with our decor.
reviews.author: Sagebrush

reviews.title: "Allen+Roth Mirror"
reviews.text: This ALLEN+ROTH mirror is an awesome addition to my bath/laundry room. Trying to give my 1975 home a casual update!! I have had many compliments on the finished look! Easy to install! I topped it off with a PROGRESS light fixture! The picture sums it up. I recommend to anyone looking for mirror made with 'reclaimed' wood!(sorry..I don't know how to rotate pic :)
reviews.author: Barby

reviews.title: "Beautiful rustic mirror"
reviews.text: I purchased this mirror online and the picture does not do it justice.  It is farmhouse decor perfect!
reviews.author: Aims

reviews.title: "Perfect for our rustic bathroom"
reviews.text: Fell in love with this mirror for our bath.  Great rustic look.  Matches the exposed iron pipe we have as decorating pieces.  Would buy again for sure.
reviews.author: LBJDN

reviews.title: "Perfect for a rustic theme"
reviews.text: You can hang this either way. We did attach a wire between the hangers so we could match up with studs. For a mirror this size, using real wood it is surprisingly light weight yet we'll made. It is exactly what we needed.
reviews.author: Fbare

reviews.title: "Scratches and Dents"
reviews.text: Bought 2. Both were scratched up and had debts in the wood.
reviews.author: Mb

reviews.text: Although mirror is decent the mounting brackets need to be improved. Bracket holes are not even with each other. Of the two mounting holes one was higher than the other and one was farther in from the edge of the frame than the other. Had to do a lot of calculating in order to make mirror hang even when I placed screws in wall.

answers.author: KQ11
answers.text: 40.55x30.31 - was hoping the other review was right but I'm at the store and these are the correct dimensions

questions.question: "Does this mirror come in another size? Love it, but too big."
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, this mirror does not come in another size.

questions.question: "Does this mirror come is a size bigger?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, this mirror doesn't come in bigger sizes.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, it does not come in gray.

questions.question: "Size/scale appropriate for above a 48" bathroom vanity?"
questions.author: Vanessa

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, the mirror is suitable for above a vanity of that sizing.

questions.question: "Can this be hung in a bathroom?"
questions.author: Rfm

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, this product can be used in a bathroom.

questions.question: "What is the width of the frame?"
questions.author: Sally

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The width of the frame is 30.31".

questions.question: "If I'm reading this correctly the mirror portion is 30.31x40.55. What are the dimensions including the frame?"
questions.author: Cm21

answers.author: Jen
answers.text: No, those are the Overall Outer Dimensions including the frame.

questions.question: "If I'm reading this correctly the mirror portion is 30.31x40.55. What are the dimensions including the frame?"
questions.author: Cm21

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The dimensions are Depth (Inches) 1.625, Width (Inches) 30.31, Height (Inches) 40.55.
